import React from 'react'; import Header from '../components/header'; import { useSelector } from 'react-redux'; import { RootState } from '../redux/store'; import { DebtData } from '../utils/type'; import { MDBContainer, MDBRow, MDBCol, MDBCard, MDBCardBody, MDBBadge, MDBListGroup, MDBListGroupItem } from 'mdb-react-ui-kit'; import dashboard1 from '../images/dashboard1.svg'; import dashboard2 from '../images/dashboard2.svg'; import dashboard3 from '../images/dasboard3.svg'; const DashboardPage = () => { const { debtData } = useSelector((state: RootState) => state.debtList); const totalDebtAmount = debtData.reduce((total, debt) => total + debt.debtAmount, 0); const averageInstallment = debtData.length > 0 ? debtData.reduce((total, debt) => total + debt.installment, 0) / debtData.length : 0; const averageInterestRate = debtData.length > 0 ? debtData.reduce((total, debt) => total + debt.interestRate, 0) / debtData.length : 0; const today = new Date(); const formattedToday = today.toISOString().split('T')[0]; const upcomingPayments = debtData.filter(debt => { const paymentStartDate = new Date(debt.paymentStart).toISOString().split('T')[0]; return paymentStartDate >= formattedToday; }); const calculatePaymentAmount = (debt: DebtData): number => { return debt.debtAmount / debt.installment; }; return (
DashboardPage

Total debt

{currencyFormatter.format(totalDebtAmount)}

Average Installment

{averageInstallment}

Average Interest Rate

{averageInterestRate.toFixed(2)}%

Ödemesi Yaklaşan Borçlar

    {upcomingPayments.map((debt: DebtData) => (
  • {debt.debtName}: {currencyFormatter.format(calculatePaymentAmount(debt))}
    • ))}
Subheading
Cras justo odio
14
Subheading
Cras justo odio
14
Subheading
Cras justo odio
14
); }; export default DashboardPage;
